    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        public void addNode(PermissionNode toAdd)
        Deprecated. 
        Adds the given node to this node. Sorts this node's subnodes and recursively sorts the added node's subnodes. Fails if the specified node already exists. This nodes leaf status is updated if necessary.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - the node to add

      • removeNode

        public void removeNode(PermissionNode toRemove)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the given node if it exists in this nodes subnodes. This nodes leaf status is updated if necessary.
        Parameters:
        toRemove - the PermissionNode to remove

      • contains

        public boolean contains(PermissionNode permissionNode)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns true if the given node is contained anywhere in this node. It must have the same full name in order to match with a permission node contained in this tree.
        Parameters:
        permissionNode - the node to check for
        Returns:
        true if this contains the given node

      • getSubnodes

        public java.util.LinkedList<PermissionNode> getSubnodes()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of subnodes owned by this node. This will be null if it is a leaf node.
        Returns:
        any subnodes this node contains
        See Also:
        isLeaf()

      • getSubnodeNames

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getSubnodeNames()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of all subnodes attached to this node. Nodes attached to the subnodes are not included (this is the first level down on the tree). This list is sorted alphabetically.
        Returns:
        the list of subnodes

      • getSubnodeFullNamesRecursively

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getSubnodeFullNamesRecursively()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of the full names of all subnodes, recursively. This list is sorted alphabetically.
        Returns:
        the list of all subnodes full names

      • getSubnodesRecursively

        public java.util.LinkedList<PermissionNode> getSubnodesRecursively()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of all nodes in the tree of subnodes belonging to this node. This is recursive.
        Returns:
        all subnodes belonging to this node

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns true if this is a leaf node (that is, has no subnodes). If this has nodes belonging to it, it is not a leaf node.
        Returns:
        true if this has no subnodes

      • getDefault

        public DefaultPermissionValue getDefault()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the default value of this permission.
        Returns:
        default value of this permission.

      • setDefault

        public void setDefault(DefaultPermissionValue value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the default value of this permission.

        This will not be saved to disk, and is a temporary operation until the server reloads permissions. Changing this default will cause all PermissionHolders that contain this permission to recalculate their permissions

        Parameters:
        value - the new default to set

      • hasParent

        public boolean hasParent()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns true if this node has a parent node. If this is the root of a tree of nodes, it will not have a parent. This returns false if getParent() will return null.
        Returns:
        true if this node has a parent

      • getValue

        public boolean getValue()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the value associated with this node. This value may be different than the values in subnodes if the subnodes exist.
        Returns:
        the value for this node

      • getParent

        public PermissionNode getParent()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the parent node, if one exists. If there is no parent node, returns null.
        Returns:
        the parent node, if any
        See Also:
        hasParent()

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the name of the permission. This is just the name of the current node. The full path for the permission includes the names of parent nodes if they exist.
        Returns:
        the name of this node

      • getFullName

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the full name of the permission. This is the name of the root node for this permission tree, followed by subnode names all the way down to this node name. Names are separated by a period (".").
        Returns:
        The full name of this permission

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a brief description of this permission, if set.
        Returns:
        breif description of this permission

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Deprecated. 
        If the node is not a leaf, sorts the subnodes alphabetically. This is recursive and sorts all subnodes.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(PermissionNode o)
        Deprecated. 
        Compares the names of the nodes. This is the same thing as alphabetically sorting the strings representing the names of the nodes.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<PermissionNode>
